hanzi-su-wiki:
選

Значения

Выбирать, отбирать

Мнемоника

  • Тянуть жребий при назначении на должность «правитель пограничных провинций». Кандидаты, собравшись вместе 共, сами тянули 辶 бирку 己, либо с назначением, либо с отказом.

  • "Давайте выберем нашего лидера вместе 共."

Варианты

选
purpleculture_pinyin:
xuǎn
to choose; to pick; to select; to elect
выбирать; подобрать; выбирать; Выбирать
rtega_mnemonic:
選選RS
选选		choose, select, elect, election
  • subservient people 巽 going ⻌ to the elected official to bow together 巽
  • ⓢ elected person going ⻌ before 先 his people
  • ⓢ choose before 先 going ⻌
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 选)
Pictophonetic: 巽 indicates the sound; 辶 (walk) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
選擇 [ xuǎn zé ]: to select; to pick; choice; option; alternative
選舉 [ xuǎn jǔ ]: to elect; election; Classifiers: 次
選手 [ xuǎn shǒu ]: athlete; contestant
選拔 [ xuǎn bá ]: to select the best
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿺ Surround from lower left
    • 辶 [ chuò ] to walk; walking
    • 巽 [ xùn ] mild, modest, obedient; southeast; 5th of the 8 trigrams
heisig_chinese_memo: There were so many snakes together on the road to Noah's ark so they had to choose which two would represent the snake species.
heisig_constituent: elect, southeast, snake, self, strung together, salad, animal legs, eight, road, snake2, self2
koohiiStory1: Isn't this how the US presedential election works? You are given a choice between two snakes. Their politics are actually strung together but you get to feel as though you chose which one you want to lead you down the political road for the next four years. So which snake are you going to elect?
koohiiStory2: You´re driving on the road and you see two snakes together. You can´t avoid both, so you have to elect which one gets run over.
jp_example_words:
選挙(せんきょ): election
選考(せんこう): selection, screening
抽選(ちゅうせん): lottery, raffle, drawing (of lots)
当選(とうせん): being elected, winning the prize
選手(せんしゅ): player (in game), team
選択(せんたく): selection, choice
選ぶ(えらぶ): choose
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You want to get a scooter so you have one of yourself (oneself) and another self working together to choose. The two tiny yous sit on each of your shoulders and argue about which scooter you should choose.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The white self says you should choose the safest scooter. The red self says safety is for suckers, and you should buy one that's loud and dangerous and covered in flames.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Suddenly your selfs both gasp and choose the scooter in front of you that looks like a centaur (せん). The scooter is designed like a human on the top, the bars are its arms, and the bottom with the seat and the wheels are all horse. This centaur is what you choose to ride.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: The white self says, I choose this centaur scooter because of its strong arms. The red self says, I choose this scooter because it looks like a badass horse monster, wooh!
Ru_Radicals: ｜, 二 (два), ハ, 込 (внутрь), 已 (уже)
Ru_trainchinese:
xuǎn: (глаг) выбирать, избирать
xuǎn: (графема) выбранный человек или вещь; собрание, антология
Kanshudo_mnemonic: two selves (己) together (共) move (⻌) and choose
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Before walking somewhere you have to choose which road to take.
humanum_full_description_en:
Inscriptions from the " stop ", " Sunda " sound, " Sunda " like obedient kneeling human form, " stop " as the toes, meaning there are walking, the suspect sent the original meaning is humbly (Xu Shen). The original meaning of " choice " is deportation, and deportation is related to the meaning of sending away and abandoning. Choices and choices involve choices, so " choice " also has the meaning of choice and simple choice.

"Shuowen": "Select, send it. From Zun, Xun, Xun, send it. Xun also sounds. One says choose, choose." Zhu Jun said: "Teach Xun as well." Shun, Shun, It is said that the deportation is respectful (Tang Kejing).

" Xuan " in the inscription " Xuan " is passed false as "䍻", which means a lamb. The nine-year Wei Ding: "Xuan Pi Er, Xuan (䍻) Pi Er", " Xi " is a ram, and "䍻" is a lamb. Ram skin and two lamb skins (Tang Lan).

" Selected " in Han silk script is " Pun ", "Mawangdui. "Health Recipe": "Take one to choose one fight", "Choose one out of one fight", "𧉸蠃three fights". "Xuanxuan", "𧉸蠃" and "Both" are one thing, that is, "Er Ya. Guo Pu's note in "Shu Chong": "Snails." Ancient books are also called "Pu Pan" and "Bo Pan" (Hao Yixing, Wang Hui).

The Yinqueshan Han Bamboo Slips "Using Soldiers" and "Counting Soldiers" are "selecting soldiers". The sounds of " Xuan " and " Suan " are similar, "The Analects. "Zilu", "Which foot counts", "Salt and Iron Theory. "Miscellaneous" is quoted as "Who is enough to choose". " Using " from the sound of " calculating ", so it can also be connected with " choosing ". "Selected soldiers" means selected soldiers. The term "selection of soldiers" is often seen in ancient books, such as "Warring States. "Qi Ceyi" "The selection of a good soldier is also dying", "Lu Shi Chun Qiu. "Love Class": "It is not necessary to be strong and strong, but also to select soldiers and trainees." (Qiu Xigui, Wang Hui)
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from the " stop ", " Sunda " sound, " Sunda " like obedient kneeling human form, " stop " as the toes, meaning there are walking, the suspect sent the original meaning is humbly (Xu Shen). The extension is choice.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「止」，「巽」聲，「巽」象順服的跪坐人形，「止」象腳趾，有行走之意，疑本義是恭順地遣送(許慎)。「選」的本義是遣送，遣送與送走、捨棄義相關，選擇、抉擇即有取捨，故「選」又有選擇、簡擇之義。

　　《說文》：「選，遣也。从辵、巽，巽，遣之。巽亦聲。一曰選，擇也。」朱駿聲曰：「按以愻訓巽也。」愻，順也，謂恭順遣送之也(湯可敬)。

　　金文「選」通假為「䍻」，表示小羊，九年衛鼎：「羝皮二、選(䍻)皮二」，「羝」是公羊，「䍻」是羔羊，指贈送兩張公羊皮和兩張羔羊皮(唐蘭)。

　　漢帛書「選」通假為「蠃」，《馬王堆．養生方》：「取岪選一斗」、「即出岪選」、「𧉸蠃三斗」。「岪選」、「𧉸蠃」、「勃蠃」為一物，亦即《爾雅．釋蟲》之「蚹蠃」，郭璞注：「即蝸牛也。」古書亦作「蒲蠃」、「薄蠃」等(郝懿行、王輝)。

　　銀雀山漢簡「篡卒」、「算卒」即是「選卒」。「選」和「算」音近相通，《論語．子路》「何足算也」，《鹽鐵論．雜事》引作「何足選哉」，「篡」從「算」聲，所以也可以和「選」相通。「選卒」就是精選的士卒。古書中「選卒」之稱屢見，如《戰國策．齊策一》「其良士選卒亦殪」，《呂氏春秋．愛類》：「非必堅甲利兵，選卒練士也。」(裘錫圭、王輝)
humanum_short_description: 金文從「止」，「巽」聲，「巽」象順服的跪坐人形，「止」象腳趾，有行走之意，疑本義是恭順地遣送(許慎)。引申為選擇。

①挑揀，擇：選擇。選購。選輯(ａ．挑選並輯錄；b．選輯成的書)。選拔。選用。選賢任能。
②用投票或舉手等表決方式推舉出代表或負責人：選舉。普選。
③被選中的(人或物)：入選。人選。
④選輯成冊的作品：文選。詩選。短篇小說選。

金文從「 止 」，「 巽 」聲，「 巽 」象順服的跪坐人形，「 止 」象腳趾，有行走之意，疑本義是恭順地遣送(許慎)。「 選 」的本義是遣送，遣送與送走、捨棄義相關，選擇、抉擇即有取捨，故「 選 」又有選擇、簡擇之義。 《說文》：「選，遣也。从辵、巽，巽，遣之。巽亦聲。一曰選，擇也。」朱駿聲曰：「按以愻訓巽也。」愻，順也，謂恭順遣送之也(湯可敬)。 金文「 選 」通假為「 䍻 」，表示小羊，九年衛鼎：「羝皮二、選(䍻)皮二」，「 羝 」是公羊，「 䍻 」是羔羊，指贈送兩張公羊皮和兩張羔羊皮(唐蘭)。 漢帛書「 選 」通假為「 蠃 」，《馬王堆．養生方》：「取岪選一斗」、「即出岪選」、「𧉸蠃三斗」。「岪選」、「𧉸蠃」、「勃蠃」為一物，亦即《爾雅．釋蟲》之「蚹蠃」，郭璞注：「即蝸牛也。」古書亦作「蒲蠃」、「薄蠃」等(郝懿行、王輝)。 銀雀山漢簡「篡卒」、「算卒」即是「選卒」。「 選 」和「 算 」音近相通，《論語．子路》「何足算也」，《鹽鐵論．雜事》引作「何足選哉」，「 篡 」從「 算 」聲，所以也可以和「 選 」相通。「選卒」就是精選的士卒。古書中「選卒」之稱屢見，如《戰國策．齊策一》「其良士選卒亦殪」，《呂氏春秋．愛類》：「非必堅甲利兵，選卒練士也。」(裘錫圭、王輝)

The original meaning of " choice" is deportation, and deportation is related to the meaning of sending away and abandoning. Choices and choices involve choices, so " choice" also has the meaning of choice and simple choice. "Shuowen": "Select, send it. From Zun, Xun, Xun, send it. Xun also sounds. One says choose, choose." Zhu Jun said: "Teach Xun as well." Shun, Shun, It is said that the deportation is respectful (Tang Kejing). 選字的基本解释

選
xuǎn
见“选”。

選字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuǎn］
［《廣韻》思兖切，上獮，心。］
［《廣韻》息絹切，去線，心。］
“选1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。
(1)遣送；放逐。
(2)派遣。
(3)选择；挑选。
(4)量才授官，铨选。
(5)指负责铨选官吏的吏部有关机构。
(6)被选拔出来的人才。
(7)选本；选辑成册的作品。
(8)《昭明文选》的简称。
(9)用投票或举手等表决方式选出代表或负责人。
(10)整齐。
(11)进入。
(12)德行。
(13)牵引；攀连。
(14)须臾；片刻。
(15)遍，尽。
(16)通“巽”。柔弱；惧怯。参见“選懦”、“選耎”。
(17)通“饌”。陈设；置备。
(18)古地名。在今湖北省枝江县境。
[②]［suàn］
［《集韻》損管切，上緩，心。］
“选2”的繁体字。
(1)数词。万。
(2)一说十秭为选。
(3)通“算”。数；计算。
[③]［shuā］
［《集韻》數滑切，入舝，生。］
“选3”的繁体字。

選字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【辵字部】　選； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1265第13
【廣韻】先兗切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】須兗切，?音?。【玉篇】擇也。【詩·邶風】威儀棣棣，不可選也。【禮·禮運】選賢與能。【左傳·襄九年】舉不失選。　又少選，須臾也。【呂覽】少選發而視之。亦曰選閒。　又【正韻】白選，貨貝名。【史記·平準書】白金三品，其一圜之其文龍，名白選。　又【玉篇】去絹切【廣韻】思絹切【集韻】【正韻】須絹切，?音潠。【禮·王制】命鄕論秀士升之司徒，曰選士。【註】選，宣練反。　又【正韻】銓官也。【唐書】有《選舉志》。　又環舞也。【詩·齊風】舞則選兮。　又【字彙補】萬也。【山海經】五億十選九千八百步。【楊愼云】選與萬，古音通，遂借其字。　又選懦仁弱也。【後漢·淸河王傳】選懦之恩，知非國典。【註】選懦，仁弱慈戀，不決之意也。　又選懦、選耎，畏怯之意。【前漢·西南夷傳】議者選耎，復守和議。【後漢·西羌傳】公卿選懦，容頭過身。　又【廣韻】思管切【集韻】損管切，?音算。【集韻】數也。【書·盤庚】世選爾勞。【傳】數也。【左傳·昭九年】弗去

["Guangyun" thinking and cutting, upright, heart. ]

Traditional characters of "选1". Also known as "1".
(1) Deportation; exile.
(2) Dispatch.
(3) Selection; selection.
(4) The amount of talents is awarded to officials and qualified for selection.
(5) Refers to the relevant agencies of officials responsible for the selection of officials.
(6) Talents who have been selected.
(7) Selected works; selected works in volume.
(8) The abbreviation of "Selected Works of Zhaoming".
(9) Election of representatives or responsible persons by means of voting or show of hands.
(10) Neat.
(11) Enter.
(12) Virtue.
(13) Traction; climbing even.
(14) A short while; a moment.
(15) Times, all.
(16) Through "Sunda". Weak; fearful. See "select cowardly", "select cowardly".
(17) Through "food". Furnishings; provisioning.
(18) Ancient place names. In today's Zhijiang County, Hubei Province.

(3) Through "calculation". Number; calculation.

Name meaning
Nothing.
xuǎn, xuàn, suàn, shuā
вм. 选

選

Значения

Выбирать, отбирать

Мнемоника

  • Тянуть жребий при назначении на должность «правитель пограничных провинций». Кандидаты, собравшись вместе 共, сами тянули 辶 бирку 己, либо с назначением, либо с отказом.

  • "Давайте выберем нашего лидера вместе 共."

Варианты

选

Radicals: 己, 共  (oneself, together, scooter)
Meaning Mnemonic
You want to get a scooter so you have one of yourself (oneself) and another self working together to choose. The two tiny yous sit on each of your shoulders and argue about which scooter you should choose.
The white self says you should choose the safest scooter. The red self says safety is for suckers, and you should buy one that's loud and dangerous and covered in flames.
Reading Mnemonic
Suddenly your selfs both gasp and choose the scooter in front of you that looks like a centaur (せん). The scooter is designed like a human on the top, the bars are its arms, and the bottom with the seat and the wheels are all horse. This centaur is what you choose to ride.
The white self says, I choose this centaur scooter because of its strong arms. The red self says, I choose this scooter because it looks like a badass horse monster, wooh!
